title: BSF जवानों के सड़क हादसे का पुराना वीडियो वायरल, लद्दाख में शहीद हुए भारतीय जवानों का बताया
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: our blood is boiling for what Chinese did to our soldiers in Galwan valley. The Modi Ji’s and army leadership response is very much heart wrenching. We never imagined our soldiers will die like this and our leadership won’t be even able to threat China for consequences 😡😡 pic.twitter.com/mFUYouVt1p
